title: Has Judge Sasha and Malia Obama won the Father's Biological Award for $14 million?
subtitle: Among the many evidence that there is something very wrong with this story is the fact that its author miswrote the name of former President Barack Obama.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The decision of the judge "Biofather" of Sasha and Malia Obama to settle the Tribunal in the amount of $14 million.
